name: template-for-proposals
description: A repository template for ECMAScript proposals.

scripts.build:locale-sensitive-functions: mkdirp out/locale-sensitive-functions && ecmarkup locale-sensitive-functions/diff.emu out/locale-sensitive-functions/diff.html && ecmarkup locale-sensitive-functions/proposed.emu out/locale-sensitive-functions/proposed.html
scripts.build:numberformat: mkdirp out/numberformat && ecmarkup numberformat/diff.emu out/numberformat/diff.html && ecmarkup numberformat/proposed.emu out/numberformat/proposed.html
scripts.build:negotiation: mkdirp out/negotiation && ecmarkup negotiation/diff.emu out/negotiation/diff.html && ecmarkup negotiation/proposed.emu out/negotiation/proposed.html
scripts.build:pluralrules: mkdirp out/pluralrules && ecmarkup pluralrules/diff.emu out/pluralrules/diff.html && ecmarkup pluralrules/proposed.emu out/pluralrules/proposed.html
scripts.build: mkdirp out && npm run build:readme && npm run build:locale-sensitive-functions && npm run build:numberformat && npm run build:negotiation && npm run build:pluralrules
